reviews.review_msg: GREAT teacher, very interested in subject matter.  Great slides, very helpful, and course material is very clear to understand!!!  Have also taken Arch.100 with her as well, and would love to take more classes with her.
she was very nice and helpful
She is such a nice prof.  2 hours lectures and 1 hour video.  Although she talks kinda fast, but if u go listen to the lecture tape, the lecture will be very clear.

Rob Rondeau is an extremely passionate and knowledgeable underwater arch prof. His lectures were entertaining and insightful. He is very understanding when it comes to deadlines and cares about his students succeeding!

Rob was an amazing professor! You could tell he was really passionate about the subject, and he really wanted the students to succeed. It was inspiring seeing how much knowledge he had on underwater archaeology and the love he has for the field. He was very understanding with deadlines and always replied to emails efficiently. Awesome guy :)

Professor Rondeau is the best I have had the privilege of learning from. He is very passionate about Underwater Archaeology and diving. This is evident in lectures, where he shares his experience and vast knowledge of the sea and its human history. He also incorporates environment problems and modern discoveries. I highly recommend taking his class
